TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FocusManager extends System.Object
public ref class FocusManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一組靜態方法、附加屬性和事件，以判斷並設定焦點範圍，並在範圍內設定可焦點化的項目。

span.span: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中有兩個關於焦點的概念︰ 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點。In Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus. 目前接收鍵盤輸入的項目與鍵盤焦點。Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input. 可以有只有一個具有鍵盤焦點的項目。There can be only one element with keyboard focus. 這個具有鍵盤焦點的項目具有設定為`true`。This element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 傳回具有鍵盤焦點的項目。 returns the element with keyboard focus. 邏輯焦點有關特定的焦點範圍內。Logical focus pertains to the within a specific focus scope. 焦點範圍是在容器項目追蹤其範圍內。A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the within its scope. 根據預設，類別是焦點範圍，因為， ，和類別。By default, the class is a focus scope as are the , , and classes. 為焦點範圍的項目具有設定為`true`。An element which is a focus scope has set to `true`. 可以有多個項目具有邏輯焦點，但只能有一個單一的焦點範圍內的邏輯焦點的項目。There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope. 具有邏輯焦點的項目不一定有鍵盤焦點，但具有鍵盤焦點的項目會有邏輯焦點。An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus. 可以定義為焦點範圍內的焦點範圍。It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope. 在此情況下，可以有父代焦點範圍和子焦點領域。In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a . 下列案例說明如何鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點變更的 WPF 應用程式中具有並具有。The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a WPF application that has a with a and a which has a . 從鍵盤焦點的變更時要，則損失鍵盤焦點，但保留邏輯焦點焦點範圍。When keyboard focus changes from the to the , the losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the focus scope. 取得鍵盤焦點，而取得邏輯焦點焦點範圍。The obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the focus scope. 當鍵盤焦點回到根目錄中的項目焦點範圍內擁有邏輯焦點就會取得鍵盤焦點，在此情況下是。When keyboard focus returns to the root , the element in focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the . 現在有鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點。The now has keyboard focus and logical focus. 失去鍵盤焦點，但會保留邏輯焦點焦點範圍。The loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the focus scope. 預設值上， ， ，並是`true`。The default value of on a , , , and is `true`. 如需有關焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)並[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).

summary.span: 判斷附加這個屬性的項目是否擁有邏輯焦點。

span.span: Determines whether the element this property is attached to has logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定的焦點範圍的邏輯焦點的項目。The is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope. 這個物件可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的項目。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 和可用來取得和設定焦點的項目，指定的焦點範圍內。 and can be used to get and set the focused element within the specified focus scope. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何讓焦點的項目。The following example shows how to make a the focused element. [!code-xml[markupsnippets#MarkupFocusManagerFocusedElementXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#markupfocusmanagerfocusedelementxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定的焦點範圍的邏輯焦點的項目。The is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope. 這個物件可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的項目。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果`element`不是焦點範圍，這個方法會傳回`null`。If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`. 使用，指定具有指定的焦點範圍內的邏輯焦點的項目。Use , to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope. ## Examples 下列範例會藉由設定具有邏輯焦點的項目，它會取得具有邏輯焦點的項目使用。The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the and it gets the element with logical focus by using the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定的焦點範圍的邏輯焦點的項目。The is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope. 這個物件可能會或可能沒有鍵盤焦點。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 鍵盤焦點是指接收鍵盤輸入的項目。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 您可指定焦點範圍的元素為焦點範圍的上階。It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in. 例如，如果是焦點範圍和其父代為焦點範圍，的子系可以指定做為焦點範圍時呼叫。For example, if a is a focus scope and its parent is a focus scope, a child of the could specify the as the focus scope when calling . 就同時專注範圍和焦點範圍。The is then for both the focus scope and the focus scope. 會提供指定的焦點範圍中的指定之項目的邏輯焦點，並會嘗試將項目鍵盤焦點。 will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus. ## Examples 下列範例會藉由設定具有邏輯焦點的項目，它會取得具有邏輯焦點的項目使用。The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the and it gets the element with logical focus by using the . [!code-csharp[focussnippets#FocusGetSetFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focusgetsetfocusedelement)] [!code-vb[focussnippets#FocusGetSetFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focusgetsetfocusedelement)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點範圍是在容器項目追蹤其範圍內。A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the within its scope. 根據預設，類別是焦點範圍，因為， ，和類別。By default, the class is a focus scope as are the , , and classes. 為焦點範圍的項目具有設定為`true`。An element which is a focus scope has set to `true`. 如需有關焦點、 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例使用，讓項目為焦點範圍。The follow example makes an element a focus scope by using . [!code-csharp[focussnippets#FocusSetIsFocusScope](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focussetisfocusscope)] [!code-vb[focussnippets#FocusSetIsFocusScope](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focussetisfocusscope)]
